Author: fruitluvr22
Text: My step mom used to make my siblings and I ask her for permission before we ate anything in the pantry so that lead to me keeping a suit case of secret food in my closet that nobody knew about. I know a stash isnâ€™t the best idea but it seems better than butting heads with your grandma rn

Author: creamoftoadsoup
Text: Honestly, it might not even be about the food. My own grandmother has early stage dementia, and we realized because all of a sudden, she became ultra paranoid that people were breaking into her house. She even made her children give back their keys and had the locks changed. I have no idea if that could be happening here, but sometimes older people blow small things way out of proportion because their brains make things seem more dramatic than reality.
